entries.journal_entry_description: There is a strange altar at the Woolamander Temple. Go there, place the force crystal from the Temple of Exar Kun on the altar, and observe what happens.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find the altar at the Woolamander Template, place the force crystal from the Temple of Exar Kun on it, and observe what happens.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Place the Crystal on the Altar
entries.task00_retrieve_menu_text: Place the Crystal on the Altar
entries.task00_start_message: Nothing seems to happen to the altar, but you think you saw something move in the area surrounding you.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Return to Luke Skywalker and report to him what occurred at the Woolamander Temple.
